mita amatharawa, wagapitiya mahatha wanija ha karmantha mandala sammelanaye hitapu adhyaksha ha widhayaka sabha samajikayeku washayenda katayuthu kaleya. 2012 wasaredi pawathwunu aasiya pasifik wyawasayakathwa sammana uleledi ‘‘2010 wasare hondama wyawasayakaya’’ lesa pidum labuwe wagapitiya mahathaya. 2005 di wyawasayakathwaya sandaha pirinamena ‘‘jathika swarna sammanaya’’ta amatharawa, 2006 di sha්ri lanka wanija ha karmantha mandala sammelanaya wisin ‘‘wasare hondama wyawasayakaya’’ lesada ee mahatha sammanayata patha්ra wiya.
